segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment by means of which the sender must uniquely identify the FINPAY message using its type and number and when necessary its function.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and, if required, the time when the message is created.

segment.name: Business function
segment.documentation: BUS, A segment identifying certain characteristics of the Multiple interbank funds transfer message, such as the type of transaction and/or bank operation, and used for routing purposes.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying a previously-sent FINPAY.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment specifying the reference of the previously-sent FINPAY.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the creation date of the referenced message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the financial institutions involved in the multiple interbank funds transfer message and the routing functions with their contacts.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: FII, A segment identifying the financial institutions associated with the transaction in coded or uncoded form and their function.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the leading FII segment to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment identifying communication type(s) and number(s) of person(s) or department(s) specified in the associated CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments containing general information about the transaction, such as the total amount to be transferred. It also contains details which pertain to all individual payments specified within the group.

segment.name: Line item
segment.documentation: LIN, A segment identifying the beginning of the general information related to the transaction (B level) by a sequential line number, which may also be used for reconciliation purposes.

segment.name: Business function
segment.documentation: BUS, A segment identifying characteristics of the type(s) of transaction(s) contained in level C.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the posting date and/or value date and/or the requested execution date.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments specifying the account relationship(s) and providing information pertaining to the routing of the funds.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: FII, A segment identifying the account relationship between the sending and receiving financial institution.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the financial institution specified in the FII segment and to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment identifying communication type(s) and number(s) of person(s) or department(s) specified in the associated CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments specifying the reference of the total amount to be transferred.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment specifying the reference number of the total amount to be transferred. This reference is specific for each total amount contained in each B level.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date and, if required, the time relevant to the preceding reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments containing the total of all the amounts of the subsequent C levels to be transferred. It may also specify the currency, the foreign exchange details, as well as any other relevant amounts.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment containing the total of all subsequent individual amounts to be transferred as well as, optionally, the currency.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment identifying the source currency and the target currency of the amount to be transferred when they are different, and indicating the exchange rate related to the account and amount to be converted.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the effective date and/or time the rate of exchange quoted in the preceding CUX segment was fixed.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying other transactions to which funds associated with the multiple interbank funds transfer are related, such as a separate foreign exchange deal.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments specifying the method for allocation of charges and allowances and to which account these charges have been directed. It may also contain the total amount of charges and allowances.

segment.name: Financial charges allocation
segment.documentation: FCA, A segment specifying the method for allocation of charges and allowances and identifying the account to which such charges should be directed where it is different from the principal account.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment containing the total amount of charges and allowances and associated taxes related to a specific account or to the same account as quoted in the preceding FII segment, specifying the account relationship(s). It may also contain the total of individual amounts calculated from a basis amount or the basis amount from which charges and/or allowances are calculated when this is different from the original amount.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments providing details pertaining to all charges and/or allowances. It may also specify any exchange rates related to these charges and/or allowances.

segment.name: Allowance or charge
segment.documentation: ALC, A segment containing any charges and/or allowances which are related to the total amount, calculated from the original amount or from the basis amount.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, A segment specifying the details of the percentage used for calculating the charges and/or allowances.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying the single amount of charges and/or allowances and specifying the basis amount from which these charges and/or allowances are calculated, when different from the transaction amount.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment indicating any exchange rate related to the charges and/or allowances, where relevant.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the effective date and/or time the rate of exchange quoted in the preceding CUX segment was fixed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments describing any taxes associated with the charges, their amount, exchange rates and date of exchange rates.

segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
segment.documentation: TAX, A segment identifying taxes computed to the charges in the preceding segment group.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying the basis amount from which the tax is calculated, if different from the amount contained in the preceding MOA segment, identifying a single amount of charges and/or allowances.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment specifying the rate of exchange related to the tax amount.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the effective date and/or time the rate of exchange quoted in the preceding CUX segment was fixed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments containing instructions and related information from the sender or the receiver of the message to parties involved in the transaction. It specifies action to be taken by the identified parties and the date (and optionally time) by which such action needs to be taken.

segment.name: Parties and instruction
segment.documentation: INP, A segment identifying the party to enact the instruction and the parties to be contacted. It specifies where appropriate the instruction in coded form.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment providing free text instructions related to the associated INP segment.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the earliest and the latest dates and times by which the instruction specified in the INP and/or FTX segment(s) needs to be carried out.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments providing information for subsequent use by regulatory authorities requiring statistical and other types of data. It also identifies the regulatory authority for which the information is intended followed by the information itself.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A segment identifying what processing should be completed for regulatory authorities.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment giving the amount and the currency of each transaction to be reported.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment giving the different origins and/or destinations (places) of goods and/or investments and/or services.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the recipient of the associated informative text.

segment.name: Requirements and conditions
segment.documentation: RCS, A segment giving the nature (e.g., goods, transport services) and direction of each transaction to be recorded in coded form.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment giving information in coded or in clear form to provide information relevant to regulatory authorities' requirements.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 12: SG19-SG20-SG23 A group of segments containing information relating to the transactions to be transferred, such as the financial and non-financial institutions involved, payment channel, amounts, dates, instructions. It may also contain remittance information related to the transactions.

segment.name: Sequence details
segment.documentation: SEQ, A segment specifying the sequence number indicating the start of the information related to each individual transaction.

segment.name: Business function
segment.documentation: BUS, A segment providing information relating to the type of transfer and the underlying reason for the transfer.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment indicating dates, taken from the original payment order and added by the sending financial institution, such as the execution dates, the posting date, the value date, etc.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments specifying the financial institutions involved in further processing the transaction, as well as any relevant contact names and numbers.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: FII, A segment specifying the financial institutions involved in further processing the transaction.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the financial institution specified in the FII segment and to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment identifying communication type(s) and number(s) of person(s) or department(s).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments specifying reference numbers from the original transfer instruction and additional references added by the financial institutions involved in the transaction.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment specifying a reference number identifying the entry and/or item from the sending financial institution's perspective.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and/or time and/or period relevant to the preceding reference number.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 15: A group of segments containing instructions intended for the financial institutions involved on the receiving side of the transactions and/or for the account owner.

segment.name: Payment instructions
segment.documentation: PAI, A segment specifying the conditions, method and payment channel used to execute the funds transfer.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment giving additional information pertaining to the funds transfer instructions, in free form.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments indicating the individual amounts to be transferred. This segment group may also contain the currency, dates and a reference related to the amount.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment containing the final amount to be transferred. It may also contain the original amount of the transfer instruction and the amount received.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment identifying the source currency and the target currency of the amount to be transferred when they are different, and indicating the exchange rate related to the account and amount to be converted.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date and/or time relating to the exchange rate quoted in the preceding CUX segment.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment specifying the reference of another transaction underlying the transfer being made, such as a foreign exchange transaction.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 17: A group of segments identifying the names and addresses of non-financial parties involved in the transaction, as well as any contacts and numbers.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying parties involved in the transaction, such as the Payee, Beneficiary, Payor and Ordering Customer.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the NAD segment and to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment identifying communication type(s) and number(s) of person(s) or department(s).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 18: A group of segments providing information for subsequent use by regulatory authorities requiring statistical and other types of data. It also identifies the regulatory authority for which the information is intended followed by the information itself.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A segment identifying what processing should be completed for regulatory authorities.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment giving the amount and the currency of each transaction to be reported.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment giving the different origins and/or destinations (places) of goods and/or investments and/or services.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the recipient of the associated informative text.

segment.name: Requirements and conditions
segment.documentation: RCS, A segment giving the nature (e.g., goods, transport services) and direction of each transaction to be recorded in coded form.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment giving information in coded or in clear form to provide information relevant to regulatory authorities' requirements.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 19: A group of segments containing instructions and related information from the sender or the receiver of the message to parties involved in the transaction. It specifies action to be taken by the identified parties and the date (and optionally time) by which such action needs to be taken.

segment.name: Parties and instruction
segment.documentation: INP, A segment identifying the party to enact the instruction and the parties to be contacted. It specifies where appropriate the instruction in coded form.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment providing free text instructions related to the associated INP segment.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the earliest and the latest dates and times by which the instruction specified in the INP and/or FTX segment(s) needs to be carried out.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 20: A group of segments providing full details of all charges, allowances and associated taxes that apply to the amount to be transferred, together with information as to who bears the charges and to which account they have been directed. A total value of all charges plus allowances may be given for every account to which charges may be directed.

segment.name: Financial charges allocation
segment.documentation: FCA, A segment specifying the method for allocation of charges and allowances and identifying the account to which such charges should be directed where it is different from the principal amount.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment containing the total amount of charges, allowances and associated taxes related to a specific account or to the same account as quoted in segment group 16. It may also contain the total of individual amounts calculated from a basis amount or the basis amount from which charges and/or allowances are calculated when this is different from the original amount.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 21: A group of segments providing a detailed breakdown of all charges and/or allowances.

segment.name: Allowance or charge
segment.documentation: ALC, A segment containing any charges and/or allowances which are related to the total amount, calculated from the original amount or from the basis amount.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, A segment specifying the details of the percentage used for calculating the charges and/or allowances.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying the single amount of charges and/or allowances and specifying the basis amount from which these charges and/or allowances are calculated if different from the transaction amount.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment indicating any exchange rate related to the charges and/or allowances, where relevant.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the effective date and/or time the rate of exchange quoted in the preceding CUX segment was fixed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 22: A group of segments describing any taxes associated with the charges, their amount, exchange rates and date of exchange rates.

segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
segment.documentation: TAX, A segment identifying taxes computed to the charges in the preceding segment group.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying the basis amount from which the tax is calculated, if different from the amount in the preceding MOA segment, providing a detailed breakdown of all charges and/or allowances.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment specifying the rate of exchange related to the tax amount.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the effective date and/or time the rate of exchange quoted in the preceding CUX segment was fixed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 23: A group of segments containing the details of payment. The content of these segments is passed through the banking chain from the ordering customer to the beneficiary.

segment.name: Process identification
segment.documentation: PRC, A segment identifying the kind of process on the beneficiary's side.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment providing free text instructions relating to the payment details.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 24: A group of segments providing details of all documents, e.g., invoices, statements, despatch advices, etc. to which the message refers. It includes information on the monetary amounts for each document and on any adjustments (with an indication of the reason for adjustments) and discounts. For information purposes an indication of the tax element can be provided.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment identifying the reference document against which payment is being made.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment giving the monetary amounts of each reference document (e.g., original amount, discount amount etc.). The amount due and the amount remitted are mandatory.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date of the referenced document and indicating any other relevant dates applicable.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment including any additional references related to the reference document.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party name and address, either by coded identification or in a clear form.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 25: A group of segments specifying the currencies and the related dates and/or periods valid for the referenced document where different to the reference currency.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment identifying the currency and associated exchange rate of the referenced document where different to the remittance currency.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and/or time and/or period related to the rate of exchange.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 26: A group of segments indicating adjustment amounts and their referenced documents.

segment.name: Adjustment details
segment.documentation: AJT, A segment indicating any adjustments to the amounts originally specified in the referenced document, and to which items such adjustments apply with the associated reason for adjustment.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment giving the monetary amounts of the adjustments of each reference document (e.g. original amounts, discount amounts, etc.).

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment including any additional references related to the reference documents.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment providing free text information related to the payment details.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 27: A group of segments providing details of individual line items in the referenced document.

segment.name: Document line identification
segment.documentation: DLI, A segment identifying a specific line item within the referenced document.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment giving the monetary amounts for this line item.

segment.name: Additional product id
segment.documentation: PIA, A segment specifying item identification codes where required.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and/or time and/or period related to the line item.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 28: A group of segments identifying the currency and the related dates and/or periods of the line item where different to the remittance and document currency.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment identifying the currency and associated exchange rate of the line item, where different to the source and target currency.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the effective date and/or time the rate of exchange was fixed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 29: A group of segments indicating adjustment amounts and their referenced documents for this line item.

segment.name: Adjustment details
segment.documentation: AJT, A segment indicating any adjustments to the amounts originally specified for this line item and the reason for the adjustments.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment giving the monetary amounts of the adjustment for this line item.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment including any additional references related to the line item.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment providing free text information related to the payment details.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 30: A group of segments indicating the end of the details of payment and specifying total amounts for control purposes.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A segment identifying the end of the details of payment.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment indicating total amounts for control purposes.

segment.name: Control total
segment.documentation: CNT, A segment providing information on control totals.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 31: A group of segments indicating the total amount to be transferred in the message together with the date of availability.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment indicating the total amount to be transferred in the message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date of availability.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 32: A group of segments specifying the details of any authentication (validation) procedures applied to the message.

segment.name: Authentication result
segment.documentation: AUT, A segment specifying details of any authentication (validation) procedures applied to the message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the validation date and/or time.
